
function yesOrNo ( val: number ): boolean | Error {
  if ( typeof val !== "number" ) {
    return new Error( "input not number" );

  } else {
    return val > 10;
  }
}

// Do Not Edit Here
console.log( yesOrNo( "100" ) ); // Error
console.log( yesOrNo( 30 ) ); // True
console.log( yesOrNo( 8 ) ); // False
